content: Can you use your reasoning skills to complete this puzzle? Fill in the blanks with three letters to create a word related to the given news article: "AI ________ Help Create a Vaccine for Coronavirus." The word you create should be a synonym for "assist."
The word you're looking for is "AIDS." So the completed phrase would be "AI AIDS Help Create a Vaccine for Coronavirus." In this context, "aids" is synonymous with "assist."
